note.p: Woman fluent in English and German interested in women’s rights. In Manchester, 1875. Probably the author of an article about a mother’s legal rights concerning her children in a German women’s journal, 1876. In Leipzig, planning to publish an appreciation of John Stuart Mill in a German women’s journal, 1879.
‘Die Rechte der Mutter über ihre Kinder’, Neue Bahnen (1876): 9–12
letter to Helen Taylor (London School of Economics Women’s Library: Mill–Taylor 8: 26)
